title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, Chat and Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, markdown rendering and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that streams Ollama responses and supports dark/light themes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection friendly interfaces and sample Blazor UI.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, CodeT5, Vicuna, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built with Tauri and React for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers prompts using Ollama with per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing strongly-typed Ollama endpoints with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for real-time streaming chat with Channels and HTMX.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels via mentions or slash commands.
